name: getCourtsForCourtLocation
description: Retrieve the courts associated with the specified court location.

pageNumber.description:
The page number of the results to be retrieved.
- minimum: 1
- maximum: 100

sort.description: The field according to which search results are to be sorted.

order.description: Whether search results are to be shown in ascending or descending order.

courtLocationId.description: The courtLocationId value of the court location for which courts are to be retrieved.

$ul: **totalCount**: The number of matches that were found in the index.
**totalPages**: Total pages for matches that were found in the index.
